20110119230817.000|20110119230819.000|TR0|think the most important moment was when

20110119230847.000|20110119230849.000|TR0|sounded like a Mandarin lesson, because 
20110119230849.000|20110119230852.000|TR0|they were standing there, waiting for huge

20110119230926.000|20110119230928.000|TR0|ALI VELSHI, CNN CHIEF BUSINESS 
20110119230928.000|20110119230931.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  We have entirely skipped 
20110119230931.000|20110119230933.000|TR0|over the human rights issue because of the 
20110119230933.000|20110119230935.000|TR0|jobs issue.  They signed deals worth about 
20110119230935.000|20110119230938.000|TR0|$45 billion that the president says will 
20110119230938.000|20110119230940.000|TR0|create about 265,000 jobs here in the 
20110119230940.000|20110119230942.000|TR0|United States.  You saw that meeting with 
20110119230942.000|20110119230945.000|TR0|all of the CEOs, and President HU, and 
20110119230945.000|20110119230947.000|TR0|President Obama. The reality is we're over 
20110119230947.000|20110119230949.000|TR0|the fact that we've lost all these jobs to 
20110119230949.000|20110119230951.000|TR0|China because of low manufacturing costs 
20110119230951.000|20110119230954.000|TR0|over the last decade or so. The reality 
20110119230954.000|20110119230956.000|TR0|now, Wolf, is that America has a shrinking 
20110119230956.000|20110119230958.000|TR0|middle class.
20110119230958.000|20110119231001.000|TR0|
20110119231001.000|20110119231003.000|TR0|China has a remarkably, quickly, growing 
20110119231003.000|20110119231005.000|TR0|middle class of consumers.  And American 
20110119231005.000|20110119231008.000|TR0|company say if we can get access to those 
20110119231008.000|20110119231010.000|TR0|consumers, if we can get a fair and level 
20110119231010.000|20110119231012.000|TR0|playing field in China where American 
20110119231012.000|20110119231014.000|TR0|goods can be bought like Chinese goods, we 
20110119231014.000|20110119231017.000|TR0|can get prosperity and some jobs back in 
20110119231017.000|20110119231019.000|TR0|the U.S.  One example, Wolf, General 
20110119231019.000|20110119231021.000|TR0|Motors sold 200,000 more cars in China 
20110119231021.000|20110119231024.000|TR0|last year than they actually sold in the 
20110119231024.000|20110119231026.000|TR0|United States.  So, business leaders are 
20110119231026.000|20110119231028.000|TR0|looking for opportunity in China and that 
20110119231028.000|20110119231031.000|TR0|could result in jobs back here in the

20110119233058.000|20110119233100.000|TR0|TODD (voice-over):  A former friend of 
20110119233100.000|20110119233103.000|TR0|Jared Loughner gives accounts of the

20110119233107.000|20110119233110.000|TR0|ingested mushrooms and used something else.
